metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7926 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A user authorized to perform database queries may cause denial of service by issuing a specially crafted query which violates an invariant in the server selection subsystem. This issue affects: MongoDB Server version 4.4 prior to 4.4.1. Versions before 4.4 are not affected.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
